comprei o jogo para 1 mês depois ele ficar gratuito T-T. Porém ainda continua sendo um jogo muito bom apesar dos hacks e os 4Head que agora têm. Ainda bem que não vou jogar com esses 4Head :P
Играю уже больше 3-4 лет не надоедает!

The game is fun, hase regular updates, requires skill to advance in your rank, but the community of this game is kind of a double edged axe, one half is so competitive and so toxic to other players that the game becomes awful to play, and on the other half you have the troll who are fun in some cases and can make the game enjoyable but playing with them is a burden because they are not interested in winning and that can affect the whole team, my suggestion is to play for rank with a pre made team and play for fun in matchmaking and don't be toxic, remember "it's just a game bro".
